DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II randomize , double-masked study compare safety efficacy ATG003 ( mecamylamine HCl ) 1.0 % 0.3 % ophthalmic solution placebo patient neovascular ( `` wet '' ) age-related macular degeneration ( NV-AMD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy ATG003 Patients With Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD )
